tool_description: Creates and manages alert rules with multiple threshold types, conditions, and notification settings for volatility monitoring.

rule_name.description: Unique identifier for the alert rule

symbols.description: Symbols to monitor with this rule

threshold_type.description: Type of threshold: absolute, percentile, stddev, change_rate

lookback_period.description: Historical period for comparison in hours (1-168)

cooldown_minutes.description: Minutes to wait before triggering same alert again (1-1440)

severity.description: Alert severity level: low, medium, high, critical

error_messages: Invalid threshold type: Use one of [absolute, percentile, stddev, change_rate].
Invalid comparison operator: Use one of [greater_than, less_than, equal_to].
Lookback period out of range: Must be between 1 and 168 hours.
Cooldown period out of range: Must be between 1 and 1440 minutes.
Invalid severity level: Use one of [low, medium, high, critical].
Rule name already exists: Choose a unique rule name.
Invalid symbols: One or more symbols are not recognized.
usage: Provide rule_name, symbols, threshold_type, threshold_value, and comparison. Optionally set lookback_period, cooldown_minutes, severity, and enabled status.

rule_id.description: Generated unique identifier for the rule
